title: Refund on Elderwood Hecarim
body: So I bought Elderwood Hecarim 2 days ago. Is it possible to get a refund or get 675 rp back since it is going to be on sale according to the december schedule? http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/december-sales-schedule-0 (That got anounced less than 24 hours ago. ) Sorry if im posting this in the wrong place.

replies.body: I can't make any guarantees but reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team will take a look.  Technically, you can perform a refund with a token but we can also look into your specific issue and see if there's anything we can do.  Hang tight, and we'll reply as soon as we can.
